Question
========
  
One of the conditions of a regression analysis is about "homoscedasticity." Which graph should we use to check this condition?


Answerlist
----------
* A scatterplot with the predictors on the X-axis and the dependent variable on the Y-axis
* A scatterplot with the residuals on the X-axis and dependent variable on the Y-axis
* A scatterplot with the residuals on the X-axis and the predicted values on the Y-axis
* A scatterplot with the predicted values on the X-axis and the residuals on the Y-axis
